DOC.brief_summary: Flutiform® compare individual component Flixotide® ( Fluticasone ) Foradil® ( Formoterol ) adolescent adult patient .
DOC.brief_title: An Open , Randomised , Parallel Group Multicentre Study Compare Efficacy Safety Flutiform® pMDI v Fluticasone pMDI Plus Formoterol DPI Adolescent Adult Subjects With Mild Moderate-severe Persistent , Reversible Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve 12 week treatment phase . During treatment phase subject receive Flutiform® Flixotiole® Foradil® individual componements . Efficacy assess lung function test asthma symptom , sleep disturbance . Safety assess adverse event , vital sign , lab test ECGs .
